articles.title: CPRC Spokesman Urges S. Korean Authorities Not to Forget Lesson from Incident in August Last Year
articles.content:
CPRC Spokesman Urges S. Korean Authorities Not to Forget Lesson from Incident in August Last Year
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK issued a statement on Tuesday, in which it said that it is the proud history and tradition of the DPRK that it has recorded only legendary stories of victory in the fierce confrontation with the enemies at home and abroad.
					 The great victory won by the DPRK by which it saved the destiny of the country and nation from a hair-trigger crisis in August last year was recorded as the most significant event in the annals of honor, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Looking back upon those days in August last year, they were the days of extremely dangerous and acute stand-off when the military conflict and the danger of war reached the zenith on the Korean peninsula after the cease-fire.
					
					 At a time when the world was watching with great concern the war machine that began to operate on the Korean peninsula, it was none other than supreme leader Kim Jong Un who made a bold decision which no other person can take and brought about a dramatic turn for the country, nation and compatriots.
					
					 The peerlessly great man Kim Jong Un, cherishing the noble mission for protecting the country and the nation, took all possible measures to smash the military provocations by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers at a go. He initiatively provided high-ranking urgent contact unprecedented in the history of north-south dialogue with the arms being leveled at the enemies and opened up a breakthrough to winning a great victory without blood-shed.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities could not but come out to the high-ranking dialogue, in fear of the destructive ruin they would face in the second Korean war. The adoption of a dramatic agreement between the north and the south helped remove a big danger of war and opened an important phase for turning the situation in favor of the DPRK and improving inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 A radical turn would have been brought about in the situation of the Korean peninsula if the agreement adopted by the north and the south one year ago had been valued and implemented. 
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye group has persistently taken issue with the DPRK, frequently talking about "nuclear threat from the north" and "provocation", thereby laying the blame for worsening inter-Korean relations and catastrophe of the situation on the Korean peninsula at the door of the DPRK.
					
					 Even at this moment, the Park Geun Hye group is running the whole gamut of vicious and despicable moves to attain the sinister aim of achieving "unification of social systems" while talking about the "collapse of the north".
					
					 The stupid and ignorant Park group opted to take the road of war, confrontation and permanent division, not the way of peace, improved relations and reunification while persistently refusing to respond to the offer of good faith made by the compatriots in the north. Therefore, it is fated to meet only miserable destruction and death.
					
					 If the puppet group perpetrates a ridiculous provocation again, oblivious of the lesson taught by the August incident last year, the DPRK will never miss the golden opportunity but launch a great war for national reunification of justice and thus annihilate the group of traitors to the last man and blow up the bases of the U.S. imperialists, the chieftain of aggression, on the earth.
					
					 The most just and independent DPRK has the proud tradition of winning victories but the pro-U.S. group of traitors is fated to sustain a shameful defeat as it is selling off the nation to outside forces and hurting the destiny of the compatriots.

articles.title: Senior Party, Army Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 9th Congress of outh League
articles.content:
Senior Party, Army Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 9th Congress of Youth League
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the party and army visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on Tuesday.
					 They included Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi and senior officials of the party, armed forces organs and youth league.
					
					 They congratulated the youth league officials and youths upon their participation in the 9th Congress of the youth league to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean youth movement.
					
					 Hearing stories told by participants in the congress on the feats performed in firmly defending posts of the country and creating legendary tales about heroes in building a socialist power, they encouraged the participants to register more signal successes in their drive.
					
					 They requested the participants to become standard-bearers and vanguard fighters in the struggle for ushering in a fresh heyday of the Korean youth movement in the great Kim Jong Un's era.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Receives Credentials from Representative of UN Population Fund
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Receives Credentials from Representative of UN Population Fund
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho received credentials from Sithy Rizvina De Alwis, representative of the UN Population Fund here, Tuesday.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to FM of Turkey
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to FM of Turkey
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Monday sent a message of sympathy to Mevlut Cavusoglu, foreign minister of Turkey, as regards the suicide-terrorist attack in Turkey that claimed many casualties.
					 Extending deep sympathy and consolation to the bereaved families of the victims, the message clarified the DPRK's stand of opposing all forms of terrorism and expressed hope that the Turkish government would eradicate the aftermath of the attack and restore stability as soon as possible.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China headed by Chairwoman Kim Yong Nyo visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday. 
					 Members of the delegation paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday. 
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders, pioneers and outstanding leaders of the Juche-oriented youth movement, and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Event Held to Mark Anniversaries of Kim Jong Il's Visits to Russia
articles.content:
Event Held to Mark Anniversaries of Kim Jong Il's Visits to Russia 
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition was opened at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday on the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Russia and the 5th anniversary of his visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern Regions.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the feats he performed in his energetic foreign activities to develop the DPRK-Russia friendship on a new high stage by visiting the Russian Federation and the Siberian and Far East Regions.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony on invitation were Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora and his embassy officials.
					
					 Officials concerned and people in the city were present.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A film show was held at the People's Palace of Culture that day.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean documentary film "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Pays Unofficial Visit to the Siberian and Far East Regions of Russia" (from August 20 to 25, Juche 100 (2011)).

articles.title: Russian Diplomats Help DPRK Builders
articles.content:
Russian Diplomats Help DPRK Builders
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy on Tuesday did a friendship labor at the construction site of Ryomyong Street to mark the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Russian Federation, the 5th anniversary of his visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern Regions and the Day of Songun.
					 After being briefed on the building of Ryomyong Street in front of a map showing the bird's-eye view of the street, they helped builders carry building materials.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the construction site.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Hold Oratorical Meeting
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Hold Oratorical Meeting
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) and agricultural workers had an oratorical meeting at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Speakers said every part of the country is marked with footprints left by leader Kim Jong Il who totally dedicated himself to the country and its people entrusted to him by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Songun politics and theory based on the philosophy of arms that a revolution starts, advances and completed by dint of arms and Songun-based principle that the army precisely means the party, state and people are shedding their rays along with the Day of Songun as they serve as an all-powerful treasured sword for the victory of the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of independence against imperialism, they noted. 
					
					 The unshakable faith that we are sure to always emerge victorious under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un is the revolutionary faith which all of us should cherish, they stressed.
					
					 They impressively told the story that to have warm love for the service personnel of the People's Army is the way of making it stronger.
					
					 They called on the agricultural workers to register signal successes in the forefront for defending socialism this year with the determination to take a thousand-fold revenge on the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					
					 Present there were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, officials of the UAWK and agricultural workers in Pyongyang City.

articles.title: 7th IT and Hi-tech Products Exhibition Held
articles.content:
7th IT and Hi-tech Products Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The 7th IT and hi-tech products exhibition of the State Academy of Sciences was held from Aug. 19 to 23. 
					 It brought together scientists, technicians and teachers of branches, research institutes and universities under the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 On display there were more than 100 IT successes and over 90 hi-tech products helpful to putting various domains of the national economy on an automated, intellectual and unmanned basis and locally producing equipment and raw and other materials.
					
					 It also involved the introduction of newly studied and developed technical successes and products and dissemination to generalize experience gained in the course of their development and introduction.

articles.title: Performance Given by Trade Union Officials and Members
articles.content:
Performance Given by Trade Union Officials and Members
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Performance "May Day of Songun Shine!" was given by successful participants in the national vocal solo and instrumental solo competition among officials and members of trade unions at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill Tuesday to mark the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The performance began with chorus "Ode to General Kim Jong Un". Put on the stage were such numbers as female vocal solos "Where Are You, Dear General", immortal masterpiece, and "Tell, O Road of Songun" and mixed duet "Nilliri for Songun."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by firmly defending the country and revolution and putting the dignity and power of the nation on the highest level, laying an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the generations to come with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 In other numbers they impressively represented the boundless reverence of all service personnel and people for Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, and officials and members of trade unions.

articles.title: Fireproof Cement under Production in DPRK
articles.content:
Fireproof Cement under Production in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A research group of the Silicate Engineering Institute under the State Academy of Sciences developed new fireproof cement and succeeded in its home-production.
					 It is stronger than import in heat resistance and 1.5 times longer in serviceable life.
					
					 The group established a method of producing the cement with locally available raw materials and solved sci-tech problems in putting its production on an industrial basis. 
					
					 The success has been introduced at different major industrial establishments of the country like the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and Sunchon Cement Complex, proving very effective.

articles.title: Development of Ultra-modern Technologies Gains Momentum
articles.content:
Development of Ultra-modern Technologies Gains Momentum
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK have paid big efforts to developing ultra-modern technologies. 
					 One of their goals is to develop a method of breeding high-yield strains of crops resistant to unfavorable agricultural conditions with gene transformation technique.
					
					 They are stepping up the scientific research into technical problems arising in expanding the cultivation area of a variety of rice highly resistant to base and growing it.
					
					 Efforts are also directed to researches into gene-dislocation potato rich in content of starch, virus-resistance potato and a variety of rice highly resistant to cold.
					
					 Scientists have developed technologies for separating and cultivating different mesenchymal stem cells.
					
					 Meanwhile, they succeeded in making a safe and effective vaccine by means of gene engineering, solving problems in making diagnosis of hereditary and contagious diseases and tumors.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Breeding High-yielding Potato Varieties
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Breeding High-yielding Potato Varieties
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Ryanggang Province in the northern highland of the DPRK, is a leading potato producer of the country.
					 It has been successfully pushed forward to cultivate high-yielding varieties of potato in the province.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Kum Il, a section chief of the provincial branch of the Academy of Agricultural Science, told KCNA:
					
					 The branch succeeded in breeding new varieties of potato, strong in resistance to diseases and high in starch content and productivity, and has planted them on a large-scale in several farms. Now, their sown area reaches several hundreds of hectares and a rich harvest is expected.
					
					 The branch also pays efforts to establishing the system of producing virus-free seed potatoes and increasing the potato production.
					
					 As a result of the efforts, new high-yielding potato varieties have been officially registered by the state in recent years.
					
					 Meanwhile, the branch contributed itself to improving several thousand hectares of arable land in Paekam and Samjiyon counties on the basis of sol analysis favorable for potato farming.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader who had guaranteed the victorious advance of the Korean revolution with the might of Songun (military-first) in his lifetime.
					 He began his Songun leadership in August Juche 49 (1960) with the inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 In the mid-1990s when the DPRK was in difficulties, he safeguarded socialism and displayed the honor of the country to the world with the might of Songun.
					
					 Since his inspection of the Dwarf Pine Post on the New Year's Day of 1995, he visited at least 2 490 units of the people's armed forces till the last moment of his life.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, servicepersons were trained for those strong in idea and faith and a-match-for-a-hundred fighters, the KPA was strengthened into an invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and the army-people great unity further consolidated.
					
					 Meanwhile, he gave field guidance to many industrial establishments in Jagang, North Phyongan and North and South Hamgyong provinces to turn the Arduous March, the forced march, into that for building a land of bliss.
					
					 In particular, he wisely led the underground nuclear test to success and thus demonstrated all over the world the dignity of the DPRK as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state, overcoming difficulties and ordeals with his matchless pluck and revolutionary optimism.
					
					 With the approach of the Day of Songun (August 25), the army and people of the DPRK are fully determined to glorify the immortal revolutionary feats Kim Jong Il performed in defending socialism and opening up a new history of prosperity with the might of Songun.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group's Talk about Efficiency of "Sanctions against DPRK"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group's Talk about Efficiency of "Sanctions against DPRK"
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- These days the south Korean puppet authorities are claiming as if their "sanctions against the north" were proving effective, inviting sneers from all people.
					 The Park Geun Hye group's vociferous talk about effectiveness of "sanctions" is nothing but fraud and red herring.
					
					 Now the world people including south Korean people admire the reality of the DPRK where its service personnel and people continue performing eye-opening miracles and innovations in socialist economic and cultural construction in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development despite the hostile forces' persistent moves to isolate and blockade the DPRK.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean puppet authorities who were driven into a tight corner and quagmire owing to their "sanctions against the north".
					
					 The south Korean authorities totally shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, joining in the anti-DPRK "sanctions" of outside forces. Owing to this foolish action at least 6 000 businesses of south Korean including 124 others which had operated there were driven into the mire of bankruptcy and more than 124 000 workers lost their jobs.
					
					 According to the south Korean economic experts, direct and indirect damage done to south Korea by the collapse of north-south economic cooperation since the Park's regime emerged ran into about tens of billions of US dollars. South Korea has to shoulder the financial burden of 25 billion US dollars owing to the "shuttle diplomacy on pro-north countries". 
					
					 The south Korean people carry on their protest actions, saying that "sanctions against the north lead to sanctions against the south" and "south Korean people are being exhausted due to Park Geun Hye."
					
					 Even a U.S. credit appreciation company and world biggest investment and banking company said that Park Geun Hye brought an exorbitant amount of damage in the economic field of south Korea and exercised a negative influence on creditability by shutting down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, urging foreigners to restrain investment in south Korea.
					
					 As seen above, the south Korean authorities' "unprecedented sanctions against the north" bring political and economic crisis to south Korea.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye group is busy floating a false story in a bid to mislead public opinion at home and abroad. It is nothing but hordes of the worst swindlers and traitors in the world.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can cover up their miserable position and realize the ambition for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north by spreading the above-said fiction. 
					
					 Confrontation with the compatriots in the north only leads to treachery and self-destruction.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Floating Story about "Provocation by North Korea"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Floating Story about "Provocation by North Korea"
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary denounces the U.S. for wooing their subsidized media into frantically spreading the story about "provocation by north Korea."
					 They describe the self-defensive counter-measures of the DPRK to cope with threats to its sovereignty and vital rights of its people as "provocative ones" disturbing peace and stability in the region, the commentary says and goes on: This just reminds the intruder into other's house of dictating its master to sit calm and watch stealing.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in labeling the DPRK as "provoker" is to provide an excuse for carrying out its aggressive strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 It is the real intention of the U.S. to meet the challenges of such big powers as China and Russia and steadily guarantee its strategic interests by holding its military hegemony in the region.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is tenser than ever before and it remains the biggest hotspot in the world despite the peace-loving efforts of the DPRK. This is entirely attributable to the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that the standoff with the DPRK, a strong nuclear power, is a dangerous gambling on destiny.

articles.title: Final Doom Awaits War Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Final Doom Awaits War Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The United States kicked off again the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill together with the south Korean puppet forces. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The drill which will last till early in September is aimed to acquire the capability for making a surprise preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK by "combined forces" and carry out multi-phased scenario for invading the DPRK including operations for "providing conditions to ignite a war", "deterring enemy's aggression", "taking initiative", "dominating battlefields" and "occupying Pyongyang" and "support to government rule".
					
					 As the U.S. bellicose forces have become undisguised in their ambition to invade the DPRK, its revolutionary armed forces are compelled to escalate their military counteractions to foil it.
					
					 However a country is just and fair-minded, it is bound to fall victim to the strong if it is weak. This is a lesson taught by history that true peace will be preserved only when one has strong muscle.
					
					 Once the Korean People's Army equipped with nuclear weapons of justice receives an order, it will turn into a heap of scrap iron in a moment all the latest ware hardware of the U.S. imperialists including nuclear strategic bombers and reduce to a sea in flames their bases in Asia-Pacific for invading the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. madcap nuclear saber-rattling on the Korean peninsula would only invite a merciless nuclear retaliation and precipitate its final doom.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Paradox about "Threat" from North
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Paradox about "Threat" from North
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea in a recent "address" marking August 15 spouted sophism justifying her pro-U.S. decision to deploy THAAD and hurting the patriots who laid down their lives in their fight against the Japanese imperialists. She went the lengths of reeling off such invectives that "north's development of nuclear weapons is unpardonable" while talking about the "threat" from it.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says: 
					
					 What she uttered is no more than disgusting rigmaroles of the wicked pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese lackey to embellish her criminal record of having turned south Korea into a veritable hell and driven the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe.
					
					 Her flurry of invectives only laid bare once again her true colors as a maniac keen on escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The DPRK's nukes which can never be bartered for anything and are indestructible are symbolic of the independence and dignity of the nation and serve as a treasured sword for peace and reunification and assets for eternal happiness and prosperity. It is preposterous for the Park Geun Hye group to dare take issue with and slander the DPRK's nukes though she is working with bloodshot eyes to massively introduce nuclear weapons from the U.S.
					
					 She will not be able to escape a stern punishment by history for her countless acts of treachery, cursed and denounced by the entire nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of U.S. "Non-conventional War"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of U.S. "Non-conventional War"
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- According to the recent declassified documents of the CIA, the U.S. has used not only arms and equipment but also various social organizations, information and communications bases and media as means for carrying out its scenario for coup in other countries. This coup is called "non-conventional war."
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article Tuesday says that the "war" is, in essence, not conventional and regular wars to be fought after the declaration of a war but a war without gunfire aimed to transform people's thinking and morality by use of information network such as internet and media and its operation sphere is unlimited.
					
					 It is also a war in the field of ideology and morality launched by the U.S. to benumb the consciousness of the peoples of independent countries and implant into their minds corrupt reactionary idea and American-style view on value, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' "non-conventional war" is more dangerous than a conventional war as it is designed to shake the firm faith of the people of independent countries in their leadership, the validity of their cause and conviction in victory.
					
					 The danger of the "war" lies in that it breaks the unity and cohesion of the society and fosters internal disputes and confrontation.
					
					 The above-said war aimed to reduce the people of other countries to slaves of the U.S is an outrageous war in which even special operation force is involved.
					
					 Confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists is an acute ideological confrontation rather than military one.
					
					 The key to the victory in this war is to stage a dynamic struggle for frustrating the corrupt reactionary ideological poisoning through a revolutionary ideological offensive.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers on Monday kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The puppet warmongers committed largest-ever shelling provocation on all fronts on August 18 with hundreds of ground artillery pieces and drones involved.
					
					 On August 19 they let fly more than 60 fighters, helicopters and transports for large-scale combined combat drill for preemptive strike for the removal of strategic force of the DPRK and precision strike on its core targets.
					
					 Earlier, B-52Hs, B-1Bs and B-2As known as the U.S. triad nuclear strategic bombers were deployed on Guam for sortie.
					
					 It was reported that tens of thousands of U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, more than 50 000 puppet forces, hundreds of thousands of civilians and armed forces of different satellite states will be involved in the exercises which run till September 2.

articles.title: Inhabitants in Kimchon City Launch Candlelight Action against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Inhabitants in Kimchon City Launch Candlelight Action against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations in south Korea including the Council of Civic Organizations for Democracy in Kimchon City grouping 11 civic and public organizations in Kimchon City, North Kyongsang Province held the first candlelight rally on Aug. 20 in Kimchon in protest against the THAAD deployment, according to the south Korean paper Hangyore. 
					 The speakers said that the Ministry of Defense plans to set Sosong-ri, Chojon-myon, Songju County neighboring Kimchon City as a substitute site for THAAD deployment.
					
					 They called for demonstrating the might of citizens' unity by checking the THAAD deployment, saying that Songju is the place closest to Kimchon City.
					
					 They urged the regime and the Ministry of Defense to withdraw at once the plan of THAAD deployment.
					
					 Earlier, more than 150 chiefs of institutions and organizations in Kimchon City issued a statement against the selection of a substitute site for THAAD deployment.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Targeting North Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Targeting North Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Bodies in Pusan and South Kyongsang Province, south Korea on Aug. 21 disclosed the danger of the joint military rehearsal targeting the north being staged by the U.S. and the puppet war maniacs, according to the south Korean internet newspaper OhmyNews.
					 The south Korean regime and the U.S. are describing the Ulji Freedom Guardian as an "annual drill for defense" but it is clearly aimed at a preemptive attack, they noted, and adding:
					
					 Such muscle flexing running counter to international law would provide only opportunity to the U.S. keen to build a triangular missile shield through the deployment of THAAD and cook up a military alliance and Japan seeking to stage a comeback to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Such military pressures as large-scale military drill would not help solve the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula, they noted, demanding a halt to their military exercises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Feats Lauded by Peruvian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Feats Lauded by Peruvian Body
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship posted an article titled "Day of Songun in DPRK" on its website on August 17 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il's field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, 1960 is an event of weighty significance.
					
					 He inspected many units of the KPA till the last moments of his life since then, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 He trained the KPA to be the matchless army and consolidated the military muscle of the country in every way, providing a sure guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 The article said he always paid deep attention to strengthening the politico-ideological, military and technological might of the KPA while making a long ceaseless journey of Songun and wisely led it and that he ushered in a new grand era of building a powerful nation despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and powerfully aroused all service personnel and people.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Held in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Held in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A seminar on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was held by the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia on August 18.
					 The chairman of the association said HE Kim Jong Un in his report said that during the period under review the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) won a proud victory in defense of socialism and construction, taking hold on the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun revolutionary line despite the grim storms of history, and successfully carried forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman noted: 
					
					 The WPK has firmly consolidated the driving force of the socialist cause by modeling the whole party and the entire army on the Juche idea under the programme on modeling the whole society on the Juche idea set forth by the Sixth Congress of the WPK and made great progress in attaining the ten long-term objectives for socialist economic construction. 
					
					 It has also cemented the politico-ideological position and given full play to the advantages of Korean socialism despite the anti-socialist, counter-revolutionary offensive and thus dynamically advanced the socialist cause.
					
					 The WPK led the socialist cause to victory with the Songun politics under the wise guidance of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the association said that the WPK has applied the theory of giving importance to ideology, the revolutionary philosophy of single-minded unity and independent political line and turned the DPRK into a politically and ideologically strong and dignified socialist power.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Mauritania, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked in Mauritania, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Media of Mauritania and Bangladesh carried a special write-up and aired a Korean film on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 An internet newspaper of Mauritania on August 15 carried an article titled "Immortal exploits for historic cause of national liberation" illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Referring to the feats he performed to liberate Korea, it said that he put an end to over 40 years of grim colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, rescued the destiny of the country and people and opened up a new era of the national prosperity.
					
					 Internet newspapers and internet news of Mauritania carried the similar contents illustrated with the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 ATN TV Radio of Bangladesh on August 14 said that he led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory and liberated Korea.
					
					 Noting that the Korean people were significantly celebrating the day of liberation, it screened Korean film "Pyongyang Today".

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Just Stand
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support DPRK's Just Stand
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Aug. 16 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims and the appeal of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 The spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims in a statement bitterly denounced the Japanese imperialists for committing shuddering crimes against the Korean people during the colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 Japan is obliged to redeem its past with candid and sincere attitude to the past crimes and be faithful to its responsibility and duty before the international community.
					
					 On the same day the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration issued an appeal to all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad.
					
					 The appeal called for frustrating all the moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad who pursue national division and confrontation, and achieving the unity of the whole nation.
					
					 It underscored the need to pool the nation's efforts and wisdom and promote reconciliation and unity on the basis of respecting each other's social system.
					
					 We fully support the statement of the spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims and the appeal of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Chinese Paper on S. Koreans' Actions against THAAD
articles.content:
Chinese Paper on S. Koreans' Actions against THAAD
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Huan Qui Shibao on Aug. 18 carried an article titled "South Korean defense minister got doused with water by people as he asked them to accept THAAD deployment".
					 It said that he held so-called "round-table talks" in Songju County to press for the deployment of THAAD and tried to cheat the south Korean people. It went on:
					
					 Residents in Songju County expressed deep doubt over the relevant data offered by the south Korean Defense Ministry.
					
					 They strongly urged it to open to public in detail the data on THAAD.
					
					 The discussion on deploying THAAD in other part of Songju County also met strong opposition.
					
					 Some people walked out as a sign of protest. 
					
					 Consequently the "round-table talks" ended without any fruit.
					
					 Some residents in Songju County who joined in the protest poured water on the defense minister as he was leaving.

articles.title: Victoria es tradicion de RPDC y derrota es destino fatal de banda proyaqnui, apunta CRPP
articles.content:
Victoria es tradicion de RPDC y derrota es destino fatal de banda proyaqnui, apunta CRPP
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ACNC) -- En una declaracion publicada el dia 23, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria enfatizo que registrar siempre los mitos de victoria en la enconada confrontacion con los enemigos internos y externos es la orgullosa historia y tradicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y continuo:
					En esta trayectoria gloriosa de la RPDC esta registrada como evento mas significativo la gran victoria de agosto de hace un ano que salvo el destino de la patria y nacion desde la crisis tirante. 
					
					El agosto del ano pasado fue los dias peligrosisimos en que llegaron al climax de la crisis los conflictos militares y el peligro de guerra que se cernieron repetidamente despues del cese de fuego en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					En aquel tiempo cuando todo el mundo observaba con impaciencia la situacion critica de la Peninsula Coreana, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo una inimaginable decision importante por la patria y nacion y logro un viraje trascendental. 
					
					Con la noble mision de defender a la patria y nacion, este gran patriota tomo las medidas para frustrar de un tiron las acciones militares imprudentes de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos. Y en la disposicion de combate preparo con iniciativa el contacto urgente de alto nivel, no visto en la historia de dialogo Norte-Sur, y abrio el camino por lograr la gran victoria sin hacer la guerra ni derramar la sangre. 
					
					Temidas a su destino tragico en la segunda guerra coreana, las autoridades surcoreanas aceptaron el dialogo de alto nivel y fue aprobado un acuerdo dramatico entre ambas partes coreanas, gracias a lo cual se calmo la furiosa oleada de guerra y se alcanzo una coyuntura importante del cambio de la situacion y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Si hubiera sido apreciado y ejecutado el acuerdo logrado hace un ano por ambas partes coreanas, se habrian logrado indudablemente los cambios radicales en la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Pero, ahora la camarilla de Park Geun-hye imputa a la RPDC la culpabilidad del empeoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y de la ruptura de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y calumnia a la parte connacional con las palabras como "amenaza nuclear del Norte" y "provocacion". 
					
					En este momento tambien la banda de Park no vacila en cometer las conductas groseras y asquerosas de todas formas insistiendo en el "derrumbe del Norte" y exponiendo el malsano intento de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes". 
					
					El arruinamiento y la muerte tragicos no los podra evitar la necia banda de Park que rechaza la mano de buena bondad de la misma nacion y persigue la guerra, el enfrentamiento y la division perpetua de la patria, en lugar de optar el camino de la paz, la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion. 
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos vuelven a hacer una provocacion ridicula olvidando las lecciones del incidente de agosto del ano pasado, pasaremos a la justa guerra por la reunificacion sin perder la oportunidad y eliminaremos completamente a los traidores surcoreanos y el nido del imperialismo norteamericano, caudillo de agresion. 
					
					La victoria es la tradicion orgullosa de la RPDC mas justa e independiente, y la derrota es el destino inevitable de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye que apoyandose en las fuerzas extranjeras perjudica el destino de la nacion.

articles.title: Cuadros de partido y ejercito visitan alojamiento de delegados juveniles
articles.content:
Cuadros de partido y ejercito visitan alojamiento de delegados juveniles
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong y Kwak Pom Gi, los funcionarios responsables de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung visitaron el dia 23 el alojamiento de los participantes en el IX Congreso de la UJS. 
					Los visitantes felicitaron a los funcionarios y miembros de la UJS que toman parte en el conclave que se registrara especialmente en la historia del movimiento juvenil de Corea. 
					
					Estimularon a los vanguardistas juveniles escuchando sus meritos realizados en defender los puestos militares y crear los mitos de la juventud heroina en la construccion de una potencia socialista. 
					
					Encomiaron a los participantes a hacerse abanderados y vanguardistas en abrir nueva era dorada del movimiento juvenil coreano de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Canciller coreano recibe cartas credenciales de representante de Fondo de la Poblacion de la ONU
articles.content:
Canciller coreano recibe cartas credenciales de representante de Fondo de la Poblacion de la ONU

					   Acto seguido, el canciller departio con el huesped.
